UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS
NAVY PIER
CHICAGO II, ILLINOIS
OFFICE OF INSTRUCTIONAL RESOURCES
October 20, 1964
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington, D.C
20036
Gentlemen:
In February the University of Illinois will open a new
campus at Chicago Circle, just west of the Loop. As a
part of the academic program, the Office of Instructional
Resources will produce and distribute instructional tele¬
vision presentations, originating in the University-owned
studios on the campus.
As I understand, the University of Illinois now pays the
maximum fee to the NAEB for membership by several Uni¬
versity groups in all NAEB Institutional Divisions. There
is only one University of Illinois. Please advise me how
the Chicago Circle Campus can be made a member of the
Instructional Division.
Sincerely
